summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4831 for the improvement of the alley in block 57, Gilman Park Addition, being the alley between West 56th Street and Market Street, from 20th Avenue Northwest and 22nd Avenue Northwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55705, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
